Articles.Content:
OS:Linux

KSP:1.0.2

Description of the bug: After recovering two Kerbals, the recover vessel dialogue shows up whenever I change scenes to the Space Center, it allow me to finish the dialogue, but it comes up again when I change scenes to the Space Center. 

How to recreate the bug: Rescue two kerbals and do a splashdown recovery.

Mods installed: 

000\_USITools 

KerbalEngineer 

QuickIVA

CactEye 

 KerbalRenamer 

 QuickScroll

Chatterer 

 kOS 

 QuickSearch

CollisionFX 

ModuleManager.2.6.1.dll 

 RealChute

ContractsWindow 

 ModuleManager.2.6.2.dll 

 Squad

DistantObject 

ModuleManager.ConfigCache 

 StockBugFixModules

DMagicOrbitalScience 

ModuleManager.ConfigSHA 

Thermal Monitor

FinalFrontier.dat 

ModuleManager.TechTree 

TriggerTech

HaystackContinued 

Nereid 

UmbraSpaceIndustries

HullCameraVDS 

 ProceduralFairings 

WaypointManager

Log snippet:

    NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object  at Contracts.ContractSystem+. (Contracts.Contract ) [0x00000] in :0   at System.Linq.Enumerable.Count[Contract] (IEnumerable`1 source, System.Func`2 selector) [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.ContractSystem.WithdrawSurplusContracts (ContractPrestige level, Int32 maxAllowed) [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.ContractSystem.RefreshContracts () [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.ContractSystem.OnReputationChanged (Single newRep, TransactionReasons reason) [0x00000] in :0   at EventData`2[System.Single,TransactionReasons].Fire (Single data0, TransactionReasons data1) [0x00000] in :0   at Reputation.AddReputation (Single r, TransactionReasons reason) [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.Contract.AwardCompletion () [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.Contract.SetState (State newState) [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.Contract.Complete () [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.Templates.RecoverAsset.CheckComplete () [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.Templates.RecoverAsset.OnParameterStateChange (Contracts.ContractParameter p) [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.Contract.ParameterStateUpdate (Contracts.ContractParameter p) [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.ContractParameter.SetComplete () [0x00000] in :0   at Contracts.Parameters.RecoverKerbal.OnVesselRecovered (.ProtoVessel v) [0x00000] in :0   at EventData`1[ProtoVessel].Fire (.ProtoVessel data) [0x00000] in :0   at VesselRetrieval.recoverVessel (.Vessel v) [0x00000] in :0   at VesselRetrieval.recoverVessels () [0x00000] in :0   at VesselRetrieval+.MoveNext () [0x00000] in :0 

If you need anymore info, I will try and get it.

Could you try to reproduce this again, and if possible, provide a save file just before recovering the kerbals, and a full log after recovering the kerbals? This would help me diagnose what is happening.
